alps.doc: A list of biological features. Technically, containers for feature start and end positions on a sequence in an arbitrary coordinate system.

descriptor.doc: The strand on which the feature is located. If not present, the feature has no strandness.
A feature type, possibly from an ontology (e.g. so:0001077). Free text works as well.
A precondition on which the features presence might depend.
The type of the condition (e.g. cell line, cellular location, regulatory process, developmental process)
The value of the condition (e.g. HEC cells)
